Hello everyone! We are really happy to announce that our team has fully completed the translation of the very popular Touchuukasou 4 by Fuetakishi. We have spent on average 6 hours a day since the 1st of January 2019 to have this translation completed. This work was done to the best of our abilities so that all of Fuetakishi's words could reach a western audience in the most accurate way possible. We hope you will enjoy reading this doujinshi as much as we enjoyed working on it! Here is the link to it on E-hentai: https://e-hentai.org/g/1343403/ae4b6c08b3/  (the doujinshi should appear on N-Hentai soon!)

This work was translated at the request of an anonymous user. If you are interested in getting something translated from our team as well or just want to look at our past work, please feel free to visit us at https://happycoffeestudios.wordpress.com/

Well, that’s what happens to NTR artists when they decide to put blackmail into it. These kinds of plots tend to escalate badly and there’s no stopping point especially when you don’t know how to end the blackmail bullshit. If you think about it, Yui had a choice. Back out, leave Mari and Takishi’s relationship be & focus on protecting her own little brother. Or, fuck him to save Mari’s spiraling demise as a sex addict and (possibly save her reputation from getting her photos being leaked.) Honestly, she could’ve chose that first option because think about it, why is it her business? Leave the lovebirds alone. Mari has served her purpose, she protected her brother being the hungry scapegoat sex addict she is. And, for Yui to volunteer into the fray makes matters even worse. Where did Yui’s mindset go, being the logical one out of the two? Where was the goal of protecting your own little brother? That sure flew out the window. But hey, the art was a ten out of ten as always.

@ChaosVoxx Thats the thing with Fuetakishi. They do vanilla and NTR respectively but moreso they normally end either on a solemn note or a harem. This stories clearly going sister harem route (until we have clarification on Yuis transition in ch.5), Elf High is pure harem, Fuukamaya is pure romance vanilla, and the story with the bullied kid getting the bullys crush (I always forget the name) is traveling down momdaughter harem as he bagged her mom too, as the husbands passed.
